bibl.title: Fragment of a Petition to Haterius Nepos.
bibl.note: P. Yale Inv. 277 mentions the dialogism√íw or conventus of the prefect Ti. Haterius Nepos. Lines 1-7 overlap with lines 6-10 of P. Mich. Inv. 6629 (= S.B. V, 8001). The Yale fragment, therefore, also belongs to the archive of Apollonios, strategos of the Apollonopolite Heptakomias. The petition could be dated in late 119 or early 120 CE. (Re-)edition of both fragments. <dialogismos>
RODGERS Peter R., Fragment of a Petition to Haterius Nepos.
141.4 P. Yale Inv. 277 145.4 P. Mich. Inv. 6629
